review: Lovely family restaurant and very good food. We have eaten at this restaurant five times during the last days, and we have been very satisfied every time.
Really nice fresh food (fish caught that day), close to jungle beach, very friendly, nice decorations with a relaxed vibe 🙂

We had a lovely experience at turtle bay restaurant. It's a small family-run business and feels very homely. We were the only visitors at the time, yet it really felt like the hosts were trying to make us feel comfortable and taken care of. Most...importantly the food was great, the seafood soup in particular was to die for. Would certainly recomme importantly the food was great, the seafood soup in particular was to die for. Would certainly recommend!

We came to eat here at least 10 times during our holidays. The food is amazing, fresh and there is a lot in your plate. This is a family restaurant they all work together and make you feel home. The prices are really good as...well. You will eat like in a five stars restaurant but with normal prices. I will miss this family and their food! Thanks again for your smil well. You will eat like in a five stars restaurant but with normal prices. I will miss this family and their food! Thanks again for your smiles.
Lovely family and wonderful ambiance. The most reasonably priced and delicious fish and seafood I’ve found in Sri Lanka. A must visit!

This is an open-air eaterie, on a quiet secluded part of the beach away from the main part of Marissa beach. Very tranquil place with friendly staff and excellent food. Love their milkshakes too. Really good place to watch the sunset from

Not only was the food the best meal we have had in sri lanka, but the hosts and their family are beautiful. They are friendly, accommodating and warm hearted. Very lovely family who deserve a visit. They go. Out of there way to help you.

A small but super friendly place with great staff, super good food and low prices.
They don’t serve beer but gladly jumped on the bike to get some in the local kiosk for us 🤗

Great view, located at turtle bay near to coconut tree hill. Really friendly. Would recommend the lime and mint cooler, very refreshing. We had fish skewers which were super fresh and chips (potato wedge style). The chicken burger was also really good.
Nice and calm family restaurant with great local cuisine. We had a mix of curries and rice. It was all very tasting and presented well. Recommended eating of the beaten path

I can recommend eat at the Turtle Bay Restaurant, I was really fond about the devilled chicken and they had great coffee! It is a family restaurant where all generations work there. Ride away I felt very welcome and in all my visits I had...a good connection with the owners. I even paid a visit in their home and felt at home. I can highly recommend this place for a visit in this quiet ar a good connection with the owners. I even paid a visit in their home and felt at home. I can highly recommend this place for a visit in this quiet area.

We ate here several times as we enjoyed the flavours of the food so much. The portions are generous and all freshly cooked. For me the grilled prawns were the highlight (I had them twice)! You can eat them with chips and salad but I...preferred eating them with slightly spiced noodles- yum. 
The welcome here is warm, the restaurant clean and the family hosts are wonderful, friendly and overall the prices are an absolute barga preferred eating them with slightly spiced noodles- yum. 
The welcome here is warm, the restaurant clean and the family hosts are wonderful, friendly and overall the prices are an absolute bargain.

One of the best restaurants I visited on Sri-Lanka! Fish deviled the dish I will never forget.
+ place is cozy, far from the party side of the beach, so in the evening it's perfect place to chill and have a quiet dinner. Cheers!

First of all the food is very very good, fresh and tasty. They have a lovely little garden and the family lives right there. We got to know them all because we visited the place many times. I will defenitely go back. Seafood is specially...good. The father is a fisherman himse good. The father is a fisherman himself.

The soups are fantastic and the seafood noodles are so yummy. 
Apart from the excellent food, you'll find a very warm welcome from the boss, who is very pleasant and welcoming.
The restaurant is nicely located and very cozy.
You will never be disappointed there!
Friendly staff and delicious burgers! Banger views from the restaurant to the ocean! Will come again if visiting Sri Lanka!

Lovely food and coffee, incredible view. Definitely come and try. We have been repeatedly since being in Weligama. 
Recommend the avo eggs

Scenic Rooftop is a cool café on top of a hotel in Weligama, Sri Lanka. It's a great place to feel the island vibe and relax in comfort. They serve really good local food mixed with some European dishes. The views are awesome—you can see...the ocean and lots of green plants. It's a beautiful spot to eat and have a good ti the ocean and lots of green plants. It's a beautiful spot to eat and have a good time.
Had breakfast here in the rooftop cafe. We had a lovely view, lovely atmosphere and excellent service! Absolut recommendation!
Nice place ! Great view, great service, great good, and the best Latte in Sri Lanka ! This is a really nice menu with a lot of choices.
Nice view at the rooftop, very decent coffee and WiFi good enough for some basic remotely working stuff. Would recommend.
Great view and delicious food! Nice flavors and a bit spicy just like I prefer (had the chicken taco). Nice staff and very good service. A hip place that I recommend!
Nice food, with a view. Hade a bbq tacos, which was very good. Nice drinks with a view. The staff are very friendly and welcoming.

Very nice service, friendly staff, amazing rooftop view and delicious food! (We had linguine, falafel and shrimp wraps and poke bowl) 
Reasonable prize. 
Ah and don't forget the super good cocktails!
Amazing service and food! The scenic iced coffee is a must try! Great view from roof top, with fab atmosphere! Will definitely be back!
Lovely staff lovely food and lovely people I had the brownie it was delicious and a good choice of smoothies with some good coffee also
Great juice, a good atmosphere, good people. A really good view from the rooftop and I love the music and the clothes shop
We came here for lunch with friends. It turned out to be a great place and also it had a beautiful sea view😍 would definitely come back!
Really helpfull for a take away in the eveving. The view is really nice also the staff is really nice
Very tasty and nice view over Weligama Beach and Jungle. Friendly personal. Nice place to chill out and quite also. Decoration lovely
Friendly staff and delicious burgers! Banger views from the restaurant to the ocean! Will come again if visiting Sri Lanka!

Lovely food and coffee, incredible view. Definitely come and try. We have been repeatedly since being in Weligama. 
Recommend the avo eggs
